description: Manage your subscription and billing details. View and download invoices, upgrade or downgrade your plan, cancel your subscription, and track your usage.
subscription-has-ended: Your last subscription has ended on: <1>{{currentPeriodEnd}}</1>.
subscription-will-run-out: Your subscription is cancelled. Your current subscription will end on: <1>{{currentPeriodEnd}}</1>.
title: Billing
usage-limit-reached-description: You have reached your usage limit. Please upgrade your plan to continue using the service.
your-subscription: Your organization is currently on the <1>{{currentTierName}}</1> plan.
